mapper.select: select s1.label,count(1) cc from project_declare t left join sys_dict s1 on t.level=s1.value and s1.type='project_degree' and s1.del_flag='0' where t.level!='5' and t.del_flag='0' and s1.id is not null group by s1.label

select s1.label,count(1) cc from project_declare t left join sys_dict s1 on t.type=s1.value and s1.type='project_type' and s1.del_flag='0' where t.del_flag='0' and t.level!='5' and t.level is not null and s1.id is not null group by s1.label

select s1.label,o.name,count(1) cc from project_declare t left join sys_dict s1 on t.level=s1.value and s1.type='project_degree' and s1.del_flag='0' left join sys_user u on t.leader=u.id left join sys_office o on u.office_id=o.id where t.level!='5' and t.del_flag='0' and s1.id is not null group by s1.label,o.name
